title: Bob Dylan: Don't Look Back
creator_credit: D.A. Pennebaker, Albert Grossman, Ashes and Sand and Pennebaker Associates
brief_description: An intriguing film biography which captures Dylan during his 1965 English tour. It includes many private moments as well as the public performances. The cast features Joan Baez and Donovan, and tracks include, “Subterranean Homesick Blues”, “The Times They Are A’ Changin’”, and “It’s Alright Ma”.
